title: Frontend Developer
desc: As a Frontend Developer, I was brought into the company as a contractor to build a functional frontend SPA from scratch, working with the company CTO in determining the technology and methodology used to carry a product to MVP.

title: FullStack Engineer

title: FullStack Engineer
